revised_title: The Physiology of Mammalian Reproduction: Estrous Cycle and Ovary Function
tldr: This study investigates the estrous cycle and ovary function in mammals, focusing on the bitch. It explores the histology of the uterus during the cycle, ovulation, and the role of the corpus luteum. The authors also discuss the influence of ovarian hormones on the general metabolism of the organism and their role in heat production and menstruation.
